      • getQuorumSpec

        public java.lang.String getQuorumSpec​()
        Retrieves a formatted specification of the ZooKeeper quorum.. The specification is formatted as: host1:port,host2:port[,hostN:port]
        Returns:
        a specification of the ZooKeeper quorum, formatted as a String

      • getRetryPolicy

        public org.apache.curator.RetryPolicy getRetryPolicy​()
        Returns a RetryPolicy for handling failed connection attempts. Always configures an ExponentialBackoffRetry based on the maximum retries and initial back-off configured.
        Returns:
        a RetryPolicy for handling failed connection attempts.
        See Also:
        getMaxRetries(), getBaseSleepTime()

      • getCompressionProvider

        public org.apache.curator.framework.api.CompressionProvider getCompressionProvider​()
        Returns a CompressionProvider to compress values with.
        Returns:
        the compression provider used to compress values.
        See Also:
        #CompressionCodec
